package.name: rail_grasp_calculation
package.description:
Metapackage for RAIL grasp calculation. Includes ROS messages supporting autonomous grasp calculation from point clouds, ROS nodes to perform autonomous grasp evaluation and ranking, and other supporting functionality.
This metapackage is intended to refine and rank a set of previously-calculated grasp candidates. One example grasp candidate is the antipodal grasp sampling provided by AGILE grasp. A ROS package with antipodal grasp sampling designed to provide grasps for RAIL grasp calculation is provided at https://github.com/GT-RAIL/rail_agile, but any grasp sampler or other source of grasps can be used. See the ROS wiki page for API details.
package.author: David Kent
